rules.description: key e or r = change brightness

manipulators.description: Hold Capslock and press e = display_brightness_decrement
Hold Capslock and press r = display_brightness_increment
Hold caps lock and v, then press spacebar = option + spacebar
capslock = hyper(hold)
capslock + a = esc
escape = capslock switch
spacebar = language switch
command + spacebar = emoji
Hold caps lock + press enter = left command + left option + return_or_enter
Hold caps lock press i = left command + left option + up_arrow
Hold caps lock and press y = left command + left option + left_arrow
Hold caps lock and press o = left command + left option + right_arrow
Hold caps lock and press u = left command + left option + down_arrow

rules.description: Hold v = option and directional keys

manipulators.description: Hold caps lock and v, then press h = option + left_arrow
Hold caps lock and v, then press j = option + down_arrow
Hold caps lock and v, then press k = option + up_arrow
Hold caps lock and v, then press l = option + right_arrow
Hold caps lock and v, then press shift + h = option + shift + left_arrow
Hold caps lock and v, then press shift + j = option + shift + down_arrow
Hold caps lock and v, then press shift + k = option + shift + up_arrow
Hold caps lock and v, then press shift + l = option + shift + right_arrow
shift + h = select left character
shift + l = select right character
shift + k = select up character
shift + j = select down character
Hold caps lock and c + h = option + shift + left_arrow
Hold caps lock and c + j = option + shift + down_arrow
Hold caps lock and c + k = option + shift + up_arrow
Hold caps lock and c + l = option + shift + right_arrow
hold capslock and c + l = cmd + shift + l
hold capslock and c + h = cmd + shift + h
hold capslock and c + j = cmd + shift + j
hold capslock and c + k = cmd + shfit + up
h = left
j = down
k = up
l = right
cmd + l = cmd + right
cmd + h = cmd + left
cmd + j = cmd + down
cmd + k = cmd + up

rules.description: key 1 or key 2 = change browser Tab

manipulators.description: Hold Capslock and press 2 = Control + Tab
Hold Capslock and press 1 = Control + Left Shift + Tab

rules.description: Delete = n, period keys (+ hold v = option)

manipulators.description: Hold caps lock and v, then press n = option + delete_or_backspace
Hold caps lock and v, then press period = option + delete_forward
n = delete a char ahead
cmd + n = delete whole line
. = delete a char after

rules.description: key s, d, f = volume controls

manipulators.description: Hold Capslock and press s = mute
Hold Capslock and press d = Volume down
Hold Capslock and press f = Volume up
